SCTX:
Begin Plague_Gedna

short nolore
short level
short greetonce
short doonce

float healthchange
float fatiguechange
float magickachange


if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif






if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" == 140 )
	if ( doonce == 0 )
		set level to player->GetStat Level
		Set healthchange to ( level * 100 )
		set fatiguechange to ( level * 400 )
		set magickachange to ( level * 300 )
		modhealth, healthchange
		modhealth, fatiguechange
		modhealth, magickachange
		set doonce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( greetonce == 0 )
	if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
		ForceGreeting
		set greetonce to 1
	endif
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	Journal MS_CrimsonPlague 150
endif



End Plague_Gedna
